text:
Clinicians devote a significant part of their
day to administrative work
documenting patient visits.

Time and energy spent on these tasks impede
clinician productivity and contribute to burnout.
Healthcare software vendors want to harness AI

in their clinical application to
reduce documentation burden,

but face implementation challenges
with complexity, security, and trust.

Enter AWS HealthScribe, a HIPPA-eligible service
that allows clinicians more time with patients,
fostering a better patient-clinician relationship.

AWS HealthScribe is empowering healthcare
software vendors to build clinical applications

that automatically generate clinical notes
by analyzing patient-clinician conversations.
With AWS HealthScribe,

you can integrate conversational
and generative AI in your telehealth

or in-clinic application
to solve various challenges

and the best part is, you don’t need
Machine Learning experience to use it.

AWS HealthScribe automatically provides
rich conversation transcripts,
identifies speaker roles,

classifies dialogue, extracts medical terms,
and generates preliminary clinical notes.
These capabilities are combined in a single API,

removing the need to integrate
and optimize separate AI services,

enabling you to expedite implementation
in your healthcare application.

AWS HealthScribe helps healthcare
software vendors use AI responsibly

by including references to original
patient transcripts for every sentence
in the AI-generated clinical notes.

Security and privacy are built-in to ensure
input audio and output text
are not stored in AWS HealthScribe
to protect sensitive patient data.
Start with AWS HealthScribe today

and improve clinician productivity while enhancing
the consultation experience.
